name: Seung-Hwan Gong
details: Received a B.S. degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include CDR, DSP-based Receiver.

name: Dong-Ho Kim
details: Received a B.S. degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include DSP-DAC based transmitter.

name: Jae-Gun Lee
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include artificial intelligence hardware design and processing in memory (PIM).

name: Seung-Mo Jin
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include artificial intelligence hardware design and processing in memory (PIM).
